com.appscend.overlaycontrollers

Interface APSMediaPlayerOverlayController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KRAdapter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    APSMediaPlayerButtonOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerControlsOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerHTMLOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerImageOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerMidrollOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerMRAIDOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerSkipOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerTextOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerVimeoOverlayController, APSMediaPlayerYoutubeOverlayController

    public interface APSMediaPlayerOverlayController
extends KRAdapter
    The APSMediaPlayerOverlayController defines all the methods that a UIViewController subclass must or can implement to be able to register as an overlay controller with the player. This protocol extends the KRAdapter protocol, so objects should also define a unique string type to register under.
    Author:
    Appscend
